instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..

threads.message: Looking for these parts amazon or ebay its not listed does anyone know if china has this ?

threads.message: Yeah i found some but are they all compatible? for that year? Also six hundred dollars is a lot...

threads.title: Macbook pro retina 15 mid 2015 keyboard trackpad
threads.message:
You are trolling right? Do I really need to give you the damn link?

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/Trackpad-For-Macbook-Retina-Pro-15-4-<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>-Touchpad-2015-810-5827-07-821-2652-A-/162058021395[/url]

threads.title: Macbook pro retina 15 mid 2015 keyboard trackpad
threads.message: Duke thanks so much for your time no I would never waste your time... The miss communication was that I was looking for the whole palm rest assembly including keyboard and trackpad, and I could not find it.

threads.title: Macbook pro retina 15 mid 2015 keyboard trackpad
threads.message: $96 for a palmrest without battery/trackpad. If your palmrest has a bad trackpad/keyboard it is best to replace them. Only remove the middle part of the battery and lift it up.
